content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one historical development in the Netherlands illustrated by Grotius’ passage. b) Describe one change that resulted from the developments illustrated by Grotius’ passage. c) Explain how Grotius’ historical situation may have influenced the argument in the passage.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
